scripts.prereport: npm run delete:reports && npm run create:reportFolders
scripts.mochawesome-merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.test:chrome: npm run prereport && npx cypress run --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/UI/examples/**  && npm run mochawesome-merge && npm run junit-merge
scripts.test:e2e: npx cypress run --env baseUrl=$baseUrl,apiBaseUrl=$apiBaseUrl && npm run mochawesome-merge && npm run junit-merge --continue-on-error
scripts.test:e2e:chrome: npx cypress run  --browser chrome && npm run mochawesome-merge && npm run junit-merge --continue-on-error
scripts.test:e2e:edge: npx cypress run  --browser edge && npm run mochawesome-merge && npm run junit-merge --continue-on-error
